H0.text: tools made from high-speed tool steel are generally used for what type of machining operations. Drilling

H1.text: tools made from high-speed tool steel are generally used for what type of machining operations. Turning

H2.text: tools made from high-speed tool steel are generally used for what type of machining operations. Broaching

H3.text: tools made from high-speed tool steel are generally used for what type of machining operations. milling

A4.text: It is usually used to manufacture a variety of tools, such as drill bits, taps and reamers.

A5.text: The main use of high-speed steels continues to be in the manufacture of various cutting tools: drills, taps, milling cutters, tool bits, hobbing (gear) cutters, saw blades, planer and jointer blades, router bits, etc.

A6.text: Tool steels are used for cutting, pressing, extruding, and coining of metals and other materials.

A7.text: Tool steels are suited for use in the shaping of other materials, as for example in cutting, machining, stamping, or forging.
